name: roundcube
description: Roundcube is a self-hosted webmail client with IMAP support, rich text editing, plugin architecture, and privacy-focused interface. Itâ€™s designed to be extensible and secure.
features: IMAP email access: Connect to any IMAP mail server to read and manage messages.
Rich text editor: Compose emails with formatting, fonts, and embedded images.
Address book: Store and manage contacts with groups and custom fields.
Plugin architecture: Extend functionality with community-developed plugins.
Multiple identities: Send emails from different addresses or aliases.
Folder management: Create, rename, and organize email folders and subfolders.
Search functionality: Find messages quickly by sender, subject, or content.
Attachment handling: Upload and download file attachments with preview support.
Spell checking: Check spelling in multiple languages before sending messages.
Message filters: Create rules to automatically sort incoming mail into folders.
Mobile responsive: Access email from smartphones and tablets with adaptive layout.
Theme customization: Choose from multiple skins or create custom themes.
